name: Space Brawl (JTB Games)
description:
2D top down local multiplayer space shooter. Very simple game made in 48 hours for my own personal game jam. I may update it later (Probably not though).  Only works with 2 player.(If you have no friends you can download the cpu zip.)

Controls

P2

W: Drive forward

S: Dash back

A: Turn left

D: Turn Right

P1

Up Arrow: Drive forward

Down Arrow: Dash back

Left Arrow: Turn left

Right Arrow: Turn Right
